quotes.quote: I am getting up for a man's work. Do I resent going out to do what I was born for, or was i created to wrap myself in blankets and keep warm. Look into nature, we are created for both feeling and action
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: I can not be harmed by and should not harm the ignorant of true good and evil
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Life for each of us is a mere moment, and this life of yours is nearly over, while you show yourself no honour but let your own welfare depend on other people's souls
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
